bv1:38.1: sādhukārā ca → hiṅkāraṃ sādhukārañca (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2)
bv1:38.2: ukkuṭṭhi sampahaṃsanaṃ → ukkuṭṭhi sampasādanaṃ (bj) | ukkuṭṭhisampanādanaṃ (s2, s3, pts1) | ukkuṭṭhiṃ sampasādanaṃ (pts2)
bv1:70.1: Kālo kho te → kālo deva (bj, pts1-2) | kāloyaṃ te (s2, s3, mr)
bv1:75.1: Bhagavā tamhi → bhagavā ca tamhi (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2, mr)
